content.name: snapSchedule
content.description: Information about snapshot schedules in the storage system.

attributes.name: isSyncReplicated
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the snapshot schedule is synchronously replicated to the remote system.
  • true - Snapshot schedule is replicated.
  • false - Snapshot schedule is not replicated.

attributes.name: storageResources
attributes.description: Storage resources associated with the snapshot schedule.

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Unique internal identifier of the snapSchedule instance.

attributes.name: luns
attributes.description: LUNs associated with the snapshot schedule.

attributes.name: modificationTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the snapshot schedule was created or last modified.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the snapSchedule instance.

attributes.name: rules
attributes.description: Rules that apply to the snapshot schedule, as defined by the snapScheduleRule resource type.

attributes.name: isModified
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the snapshot schedule was modified. Values are:
  • true - Snapshot schedule was modified.
  • false - Snapshot schedule was never modified.
This attribute is obsolete and will be removed in a future release. Please use modificationTime instead.

attributes.name: isDefault
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the snapshot schedule is a default or user-created schedule. Values are:
  • true - Snapshot schedule is one of the default schedules.
  • false - Snapshot schedule is user-created.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Indicates the version of the snapshot schedule.
